original_title: 生意気な幼なじみの後輩と5日間のツンデレ同棲生活 宮下玲奈
overview: I have a younger childhood friend. Parents are also on good terms with each other and I decided to take care of my childhood friend Rena for 5 days when the parents of both families go on a trip. Even though she has a cold demeanor, she comes into my bed because she's afraid of sleeping alone. I'm always at the mercy of Rena, who is triumphant and cheeky, but I can't hate her! It's the inside out of goodwill to do naughty things while spitting! ? Tsundere cohabitation life sent in subjective video!
title: 5 Days Of Tsundere Cohabitation With A Cheeky playhood Friend Rena Miyashita
